UPLHeadquarters.Description:
Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources.

Enables:
- Mining Drone
- CARR
UPLHeadquarters.Name: Headquarters

MiningDrone.Description:
Nano-Enabled Construction Robot

Can attack ground units
MiningDrone.Name: Mining Drone

UPLExhumer.Description:
Resource Production Facility

Built over a Fluorine Deposit to Allow Production of Francine Gas
UPLExhumer.Name: Exhumer

UPLGenerator.Description:
Provides supply.
Supply allows you to create more units.
UPLGenerator.Name: Fusion Generator

CSVDeployed.Description:
Mobile Operations Center

Can attack ground and air units
CSVDeployed.Name: CSV

InfantryOfficer.Description:
Company Commander

Can attack ground and air units
Grants detection to all transport units and turrets when inside. Condors grants 25% wider detection range.
Detector
InfantryOfficer.Name: Infantry Officer

UPLManufacturingFacility.Description:
Ground Vehicle Production facility.

Enables:
- Z-1
- A-6
- TR-17
- Routhe Tank
UPLManufacturingFacility.Name: Manufacturing Facility

UPLCommStation.Description:
SatNet Communications

Increases speed of nearby allied units and detects cloaked units.

Detector
UPLCommStation.Name: Comm Station

UPLElectrostaticDefenseTower.Description:
Automated Defensive Structure.

Can attack ground and air units.
UPLElectrostaticDefenseTower.Name: Electrostatic Defense Tower

OspreyLanded.Description:
Attack Helicopter and Infantry Transport

Can attack ground and air units
OspreyLanded.Name: Osprey

UPLSeekerDrone.Description:
Uses a laser to shoot down enemy missiles.
Cannot target special attacks.
Times out after 0 seconds.

Each shot consumes 10 energy.
UPLSeekerDrone.Name: Seeker Drone

UPLNightjar.Description:
Anti-Armor / Anti-Air Cannon

Can Attack Ground and Air units.
UPLNightjar.Name: Nightjar

UPLBillet.Description:
Infantry training facility.

Enables:
- Combat Infantry
- Heavy Gunner
- Incinerator
- Mortar Trooper
- Rocket Trooper
UPLBillet.Name: Billet

UPLScout.Description:
Covert Operations

Can attack ground and air units.
UPLScout.Name: Scout

DarrenRodgers.Description:
Crowd Control and Special Operations

Can attack ground and air units
DarrenRodgers.Name: Guardian

InfantryHeavy.Name: Heavy Gunner

Heavy Assault
